name: Team Fortress 2
summary: Simple Bukkit funpack with Essentials, WorldEdit and more
description: Simple Bukkit funpack with Essentials, WorldEdit and more

settings.name: mp_maxrounds
settings.label: Max Rounds
settings.description: Maximum number of rounds to play before server changes maps.

settings.name: mp_autoteambalance_delay
settings.label: Auto Balance Delay (seconds)
settings.description: Time after the teams become unbalanced to attempt to switch players.

settings.name: mp_autoteambalance_warning_delay
settings.label: Auto Balance Warning (seconds)
settings.description: Time after the teams become unbalanced to print a balance warning

settings.name: mp_teams_unbalance_limit
settings.label: Auto Unbalance Limit
settings.description: Teams are unbalanced when one team has this many more players than the other team. (0 disables check)
